.. include:: ../../roles.rst
.. _ref_api_c_linq_netw_close_dealer:

linq_netw_close_dealer
======================

Synopsis
--------

.. c:function:: linq_netw_socket linq_netw_close_dealer(linq_netw, linq_netw_socket socket)

   This routine will close a connection to a remote endpoint.

   :param linq_netw: Main context of the LinQ Network Library required for all routines
   :param linq_netw_socket socket: socket handle returned from linq_netw_connect


Examples
--------

See :ref:`ref_api_c_linq_netw_connect`
